title: AI-Based Customized Language Education Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mobile device proficiency and understanding of primary education curricula
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to diagnose their competency levels, follow AI-recommended personalized learning pathways, and strengthen language education capabilities through 10–15-minute modular activities in smartphone-based environments.

learning_goals: Learners can assess their language teaching competency levels with over 80% accuracy using AI-based diagnostic tools
Learners enhance core competencies by completing over 70% of personalized learning content recommended by the system, including pronunciation correction and grammar guidance strategies.
Learners participate in over 90% of formative assessments (quizzes, role-play simulations) provided in real-time in mobile environments to receive immediate feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
